channel.title: Tangram on Mountain Doodles
channel.description: Recent content in Tangram on Mountain Doodles

item.title: Property Taxes and Land Use
item.description: Since I started thinking about tax density, the amount of property taxes collected per area, I always felt that the data presentation in the map fell short. Property taxes are somewhat insulated from the ups and downs of the real estate market as they are need-based and the mill rate changes to flatten out the crazyness of the market. But what they lack in interesting patterns over time they more than makes up for in interesting patterns in space.
